title: Essential Tools to Becoming an Android Developer
text:
If you’re ready to get serious about Android development then this is where you need to start. We found some great courses to help you not only get started in Android development, but become a professional Android developer if you want to make it a career.
Complete Android N Developer Course – Build 17 Apps [91% off] 
Acclaimed instructor Rob Percival has created an immersive course on Android Nougat. Regardless of coding experience, you can learn how to program for the latest Android platform over the 32 hours of this course. You’ll cover a huge range of technologies, including open source Parse Server, Firebase, Admob, GDX, Bluetooth and a whole lot more, so no Android topic is left uncovered.
$200 $17 
Get this course!  
The Ultimate Android N Development Bundle [90% off] Android 7: Master App Development – Beginner 1 Take the First Step Towards Developing Apps for the Newest Android Operating System

Android 7: Master App Development – Intermediate 2
Elevate Your Android Development Skills to More Scalable Heights

It doesn’t matter if you’ve never even heard of the Android Studio, this course is designed to help absolute beginners learn how to build Android apps from scratch.
$415 $39 
Get this course!  
The Professional Android Developer Bundle [97% off] Introduction to Programming & Coding for Everyone with JavaScript This Beginner Course Will Give You Essential General Programming Foundations

Fundamentals of Operating Systems
Understand the Backbones of All Computers

Get your coding odyssey started with this beginner’s course in the world’s most popular programming language, JavaScript. Over this course you’ll gain solid general programming foundations, while exploring JavaScript without having to download any special software. By course’s end, you’ll be on great footing to advance to more complicated subject matter.
$1,475 $44 
Get this course!
